nodes.text: The Pius Dea Spaceport was in existence by the year 52 BBY, and was located on the galactic capital world of Coruscant. The spaceport possessed horizontal landing fields, and was positioned near the Temple of the Jedi Order and was to the far north of the large industrial area known as The Works.

The Pius Dea Spaceport was first mentioned in the 2012 novel Darth Plagueis, written by James Luceno. Controlling the Galactic Republic from 11,987 BBY to around 10,966 BBY, the Pius Dea were a fanatic Humanocentric religious cult. However, Darth Plagueis does not state a connection between the cult and the spaceport.
